definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: whence king of Assyria (Sargon) transported colonists into N. Israel, [[מִכּוּתָה]] 2Ki 17:4, [[אַנְשֵׁי־כוּת]] v:2Ki 17:30; Bab.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: Kûtû, Kûtê, mod. Tel-Ibrahim, c. 20 m. NE. fr. Babylon, v. COT:2Ki 17:24 Dl:Par 217 M-A:JBL 1892, xi. 169.
